MICHIGAN DEPARTMENT OF HUMAN SERVICES
BUREAU OF CHILDREN AND ADULT LICENSING
ADDENDUM TO ORIGINAL LICENSING STUDY REPORT
I. IDENTIFYING INFORMATION
License #: CB520304693
Licensee Name: Upper Peninsula Family Solutions
Licensee Address: 307 S. Front St., Suite 130
Marquette, MI 49855
Licensee Telephone #: (906) 228-2267
Administrator/Licensee Designee: Ricky Sanville
Name of Facility: Upper Peninsula Family Solutions
Facility Address: 307 S. Front St., Suite 130
Marquette, MI 49855
Facility Telephone #: (906) 228-2267
Capacity: NA
Program Type: CHILD PLACING AGENCY, PRIVATE
1

II. Purpose of Addendum
The agency moved from their original location in a private residence to an office
building.
III. Methodology
An on-site inspection was made on 02/02/2010 at their new office building in
Marquette.
IV. Description of Findings and Conclusions
Upper Peninsula Family Solutions has moved to a modern office building, 307 S.
Front St., Suite 130, Marquette. This office is a new suite of offices in downtown
Marquette. The suite of offices is 3175 square feet, consisting of 8 offices, 2
workstations, 1 conference room, and a visitation room.
The agency now has added a social services supervisor, and 2 additional social
service workers. As of 02/02/2010 the agency has 10 children being supervised in
foster care, 4 foster homes which have transferred from other agencies, and they
are borrowing 2 foster home beds from other agencies.
V. Recommendation
I recommend the private child placing agency continue their current status and the
agency’s address be changed to 307 S. Front St., Suite 130, Marquette, Michigan
49855.
02/02/2010
________________________________________
Don Collier Date
Licensing Consultant
2
